summary: Stormcloak n City Guards with Faces mod replaces original Stormcloak Full Face Helmets - for open-face ones. This seemingly simple and visually reasonably small (item-armor part) exchange makes - in-game - very big difference as all these bland n faceless NPCs  now have proper faces n easily recognizable personalities.
descriptionHtml:
---README---

Stormcloaks and City Guards with Faces

by Dall

v1.0

08/08/2012

Stormcloak n City Guards with Faces mod replaces original Stormcloak Full Face Helmets - for open-face ones. This seemingly simple and visually reasonably small (item - armor part) exchange makes - in-game - very big difference as all these bland n faceless NPCs  now have proper faces n easily recognizable personalities. 

For even more difference / better looking faces - try it with my Skyrim_Faces_NPCs mod.

To install you need to navigate to your Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim - game folder and paste / drag n drop in it my Data (mod) folder. Allow overwrite!    

If you don\'t like this new look, simply delete / remove my mod .esp and files from Data/meshes n textures/armor/stormcloaks and original look will be restored to your game.

Bugs/conflicts: None known with my lot - but if you have some other mod, which changes/uses same Stormcloak helmet chances are that NPCs face will be gone / not visible. Unfortunately due to zillion of levelled lists - used for distribution of this helmet/s - nothing further can be done for open face helmets.  
  
Use:
Free to use but if used for modding ask me for permission!

Enjoy!

Thanks to Bethesda for great game.
author: Dall
